= Arithmetic Agent =
Multicolumn addition and subtraction with borrowing and carrying, all the way down to counting – no math functions are used. Works with chunking. All search control is handcoded.

=== Soar capabilities ===
  * Basic PSCM functions: State Elaboration, Operator Proposal, Operator Evaluation, Internal Operator Application
